resources.string: Emulate NFC Forum Type-4 tag with a NDEF message.\nTo read the message you need a separate reader app running on a second device.
This example emulates a type-4 tag with an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT).\nIt uses an aid-filter D2760000850101 for the APDU SELECT command.
This app reads an NDEF message from an emulated NFC tag using Ndef protocol. For sending you need a separate sender app running on a second device.
This app reads an NDEF message from an emulated NFC tag using IsoDep protocol and low level API. For sending you need a separate sender app running on a second device.

This example expects a class 4 type tag with an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT).\nIt uses an aid-filter D2760000850101 for the APDU SELECT command.\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all pages will be read.

This application emulates an NFC card with an NDEF tag (sender) and a receiver for this NDEF tag (reader). Please choose with the menu below.\n\nThis app is using the official AID D2760000850101 for a tag that contains an NDEF message.
